longBusinessSummary: Aro Granite Industries Limited engages in manufacturing, processing, and selling of polished/flamed granite tiles and slabs primarily in India. The company offers natural stone granites slabs and tiles; and engineered quartz stone slabs. It also exports its products to approximately 50 countries, including the United States, Canada, Europe, Japan, the Far East, and South Pacific countries. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Hosur, India.
